posl.engine.type

Class Reference

  • java.lang.Object
    • posl.engine.type.Reference
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StatementVisitor

    public class Reference
extends java.lang.Object
implements StatementVisitor
    Reference class provides an encapsulated view of an identifier(atom) and it's unevaluated value. The purpose of this is to provide a method of lazy evaluation.
    Author:
    jbailey
